document.full_text: the army corps of engineers said that it would meet its deadline after hurricane katrina to greatly improve the new orleans area's hurricane-protection system by the start of the 2011 storm season.
document.title: south: louisiana: corps says new orleans is on track for storm goals
lines_and_colors: the army corps of engineers said that it would meet its deadline after hurricane katrina to greatly improve the new orleans area's hurricane-protection system by the start of the 2011 storm season.
